Html: I'm just... stunned.  Seriously.  Wow.  Fantastic job.
Yes,  upgrade list time cut down by about 25-30%.

Over the last week the devs have all pulled together to find ways to improve performance in each of the models, especially the ones that were operating very slowly like DPSWarr (which was the worst of them >.<)

Between Model and Base optimizations everything should be running noticeably better.

Oddly, my optimize cycle when changing specs has been quite slow on 2.2.23 this morning, using the Rawr.Mage module. It may be related to a large number of items available, but it was never this slow when specced into Fire for TtW or FFB specs.

-Taralas

Arcane is simply much more complex than Fire/Frostfire. Calculations will definitely take longer for Arcane.

EDIT: Nevermind, got that backwards, see below.
Arcane should actually be faster to compute. Can you post the character where you see a significant change in speed?
